metadata.title: CVE-2023-49286 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Squid is a caching proxy for the Web supporting HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and more.Due to an Incorrect Check of Function Return Value bug Squid is vulnerableto a Denial of Service attack against its Helper process management. Thisbug is fixed by Squid version 6.5. Users are advised to upgrade. There areno known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
